content: आतन् {c8c} <ab>U.</ab> {@--1@} To extend, stretch over, overspread, cover; निषादिवक्षःस्थलमातनोति <ls>Ki. 16. 15</ls> pervade, penetrate; <ls>Ki. 7. 25.</ls> {@--2@} To spread, diffuse. {@--3@} To cause, produce; आनंदनेन जडतां पुनरातनोति <ls>U. 3. 12</ls>; <ls>Ki. 6. 18</ls>, <ls n="Ki.">7. 39</ls>; <ls>K. 176</ls>; <ls>Māl. 5. 9</ls>; <ls>Mv. 4. 31.</ls> {@--4@} To bring to pass, effect, accomplish, do, perform; सुरतमाततान <ls>K. 57</ls>; सपर्यां <ls n="K.">64.</ls> {@--5@} To illuminate. {@--6@} To take hold of; seek to attain. {@--7@} To assume a hostile attitude. {@--8@} To stretch (as a bow).
